casebody.data:
Herman HAYMAN, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 11530. Circuit Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit. Nov. 7, 1947. Walter L. Gordon, Jr., of Los Angeles, Cal., for appellant. James M. Carter, U. S. Atty., and Ernest A. Tolin, William Strong, and Paul Fitting, Asst. U. S. Attys., all of Los Angeles, Cal., for appellee.

Before MATHEWS, STEPHENS, and ORR, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the District Court is affirmed.
